Method Detail

startExecution

ActivityInstanceUUID startExecution(ProcessInstanceUUID instanceUUID,
                                    String activityName,
                                    Map<String,String> options)
                                    throws RemoteException,
                                           InstanceNotFoundException,
                                           ActivityNotFoundException,
                                           VariableNotFoundException
Starts a new execution in a process instance at a specific activity, with a map of instanceâ€™s variable values. All connectors of specified activity will be executed normally (include connectors OnReady).

Parameters:
instanceUUID - the process instance UUID
activityName - the activity to execute
options - the options map (domain, queyList, user)
Returns:
the ActivityInstanceUUID of the activity
Throws:
RemoteException
InstanceNotFoundException
ActivityNotFoundException
VariableNotFoundException

stopExecution

void stopExecution(ProcessInstanceUUID instanceUUID,
                   String activityName,
                   Map<String,String> options)
                   throws RemoteException,
                          InstanceNotFoundException,
                          ActivityNotFoundException
Stops all the active executions for an activity of a given instance.

Parameters:
instanceUUID - the process instance UUID
activityName - the name of the activity whose executions should be stopped stops
options - the options map (domain, queyList, user)
Throws:
RemoteException
InstanceNotFoundException
ActivityNotFoundException
